English(en): To avoid being attacked by Mangle, you must be aware that it pursues you from the beginning and flash it before it gets too close; however, keep in mind that the flash has a cooldown time, during which you won't be able to use it in front of you or behind you.
Spanish(es): Para evitar ser atacado por Mangle, debes estar consciente de que te persigue desde el inicio y deslumbrarle antes de que se acerque demasiado; sin embargo, ten en cuenta que el destello tiene un tiempo de recarga, durante el cual no podrás usarlo ni delante ni detrás de ti.
